name: Vehicle Expense Report for Cars
report_script:
# Filter values from the report parameters
values = {
    "from": filters.get("from"),
    "to": filters.get("to"),
    "company": filters.get("company"),
    "vehicle": filters.get("vehicle"),
     "driver": filters.get("driver")
}

# SQL Query to fetch data with decimal formatting
results = frappe.db.sql("""
SELECT 
    lt.vehicle AS 'Vehicle',
    lt.driver AS 'Driver',
    DATE(lt.time_in) AS 'Trip Date',
    FORMAT(lt.distance_covered, 2) AS 'Distance Covered',
    FORMAT(lt.fuel_consumption, 2) AS 'Fuel Consumption Qty'
FROM 
    `tabLogistics Table` lt
INNER JOIN 
    `tabLogistic Car` lb ON lb.name = lt.parent
WHERE 
    lb.docstatus = 1
    and (Date(lt.time_in) BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s OR %(from)s IS NULL OR %(to)s IS NULL)
    AND (lb.company = %(company)s OR %(company)s IS NULL)
    AND (lt.vehicle = %(vehicle)s OR %(vehicle)s IS NULL)
     AND (lt.driver = %(driver)s OR %(driver)s IS NULL)
""", values, as_dict=True)

# Define columns for the report
columns = [
    {"fieldname": "Vehicle", "label": "Vehicle", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Vehicle"},
    {"fieldname": "Driver", "label": "Driver", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Driver"},
    {"fieldname": "Trip Date", "label": "Trip Date", "fieldtype": "Date"},  # Assuming you want just the date
    {"fieldname": "Distance Covered", "label": "Distance Covered", "fieldtype": "Float"},
    {"fieldname": "Fuel Consumption Qty", "label": "Fuel Consumption Qty", "fieldtype": "Float"},
]
# Return the data
data = columns, results
